sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' // import routing features import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import HelloWorldService from '../api/HelloWorldService' import UserDataService from '../api/UserDataService' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Placeholder from 'react-bootstrap/Placeholder'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import { SESSION_USER_ID, SESSION_USER_NAME } from '../Constants'; // Welcome landing page, that links to the Todos page. class WelcomeComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.retrieveWelcomeMessage = this.retrieveWelcomeMessage.bind(this); this.handleSuccessfulResponse = this.handleSuccessfulResponse.bind(this); this.handleError = this.handleError.bind(this); this.state = { userId: sessionStorage.getItem(SESSION_USER_ID), userName: sessionStorage.getItem(SESSION_USER_NAME), welcomeMessage: '', errorMessage: '', shnStatus: false, covidStatus: false } } render() { return [ 'Dark', ].map((variant, idx) => (

Welcome Home {this.state.userName}

My COVID status!

Am I on SHN (Stay-Home Notice)?

{this.state.errorMessage}

Click to get your inspirational quote of the day

{this.state.welcomeMessage}

{this.state.errorMessage}

My Dashboard

Employee Management employee 123 has updated her status Todos you have 5 undone task! Today's Top News! BERRAKING NEWS COVID CASES HIGH AF!! Need Help? Top Faqs today {/* */}
)) } retrieveWelcomeMessage() { HelloWorldService.executeHelloWorldService(this.state.userName) .then(response => this.handleSuccessfulResponse(response)) .catch(error => this.handleError(error)); } retrieveCovidStatus() { UserDataService.retrieveUser(this.state.userId).then(response => { this.setState({ shnStatus: response.data.sh }) }) } handleSuccessfulResponse(response) { this.setState({ welcomeMessage: response.data.message }) } handleError(error) { console.log(error.response) let errorMessage = ''; if (error.message) { errorMessage += error.message } if (error.response && error.response.data) { errorMessage += error.response.data.message } this.setState({ errorMessage: errorMessage }) } } export default WelcomeComponent;
